Who: DIRGE, Lamia
Location: Minion Earth Base

> "I'm ready to ssserve unicrom without futhere delay"said the femme while she follows Dirge

"Of course." Dirge said as he led the way down the stone corridor, his
pace swift and almost aggressive. He barely glanced back at Lamia to
be sure she was keeping up.

************************

Who: DIRGE, VENOM, CHOPSHOP, Lamia
Location: Minion Earth Base - Staging Room

They quickly reached the same chamber as before, but this time from
the ground level, two other Insectors were standing in the room as
well: Venom and Chopshop.

Dirge stepped into the center of the room, quickly addressing Venom,
"Have the other Insectors  began work on the other project?" he said,
his voice all business now.

Venom nodded once, "Yes." he said, his voice, like the other Insectors
had that strange sibilant buzzing quality to it. "And we are ready
ourselves. It is time to find our brothers."

Dirge glanced at Chopshop and then back at Dirge, "That is good." he
said, "However Lamia will accompany you."

Venom looked as if he was about to object when Dirge cut in, "This is
at Marauder's orders. Unless you want to explain to him why you cannot
follow his orders."

Venom glanced back at Dirge and then at Lamia. He grunted and then
turned around and began walking toward the back of the room, where
already a large door was beginning to iris open.

Chopshop chuckled and then jogging to keep up with Venom, "Your
comming right?" he said to Lamia.

(TAG)

Preston
